verses.verse: In the seventh <S%H7651><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehu <S%H3058><s%> Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> began to reign; <S%H4427><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> he in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> And his mother's <S%H517><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Zibiah <S%H6645><s%> of Beersheba. <S%H884><s%>

And Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his days <S%H3117><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> Jehoiada <S%H3111><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> instructed <S%H3384><s%> him.

But the high <S%H1116><s%> places were not taken <S%H5493><s%> away: <S%H5493><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> still <S%H5750><s%> sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> and burnt <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> in the high <S%H1116><s%> places.

And Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the priests, <S%H3548><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944><s%> things that is brought <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even the money <S%H3701><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> one that passes <S%H5674><s%> the account, the money <S%H3701><s%> that every man <S%H5315><s%> is set <S%H6187><s%> at, and all <S%H3605><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that comes <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> any man's <S%H376><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

Let the priests <S%H3548><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> it to them, every man <S%H376><s%> of his acquaintance: <S%H4378><s%> and let them repair <S%H2388><s%> the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> wherever <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> any <S%H376><s%> breach <S%H919><s%> shall be found. <S%H4672><s%>

But it was so, that in the three <S%H7969><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> had not repaired <S%H2388><s%> the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house. <S%H1004><s%>

Then king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Jehoiada <S%H3111><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the other priests, <S%H3548><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Why <S%H4069><s%> repair <S%H2388><s%> you not the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house? <S%H1004><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore receive <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H408><s%> more money <S%H3701><s%> of your acquaintance, <S%H4378><s%> but deliver <S%H5414><s%> it for the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house. <S%H1004><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> consented <S%H225><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H1115><s%> more money <S%H3701><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H1115><s%> to repair <S%H2388><s%> the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house. <S%H1004><s%>

But Jehoiada <S%H3111><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a chest, <S%H727><s%> and bored <S%H5344><s%> a hole <S%H2356><s%> in the lid <S%H1817><s%> of it, and set <S%H5414><s%> it beside <S%H681><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> side <S%H3225><s%> as one <S%H376><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> that kept <S%H8104><s%> the door <S%H5592><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> therein <S%H8033><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that was brought <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it was so, when they saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was much <S%H7225><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in the chest, <S%H727><s%> that the king's <S%H4428><s%> scribe <S%H5608><s%> and the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up, and they put <S%H6696><s%> up in bags, <S%H6696><s%> and told <S%H4487><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that was found <S%H4672><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> the money, <S%H3701><s%> being told, <S%H8505><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of them that did <S%H6213><s%> the work, <S%H4399><s%> that had the oversight <S%H6485><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and they laid <S%H3318><s%> it out to the carpenters <S%H6086><s%> and builders, <S%H1129><s%> that worked <S%H6213><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

And to masons, <S%H1443><s%> and hewers <S%H2672><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> and to buy <S%H7069><s%> timber <S%H6086><s%> and hewed <S%H4274><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> to repair <S%H2388><s%> the breaches <S%H919><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> that was laid <S%H3318><s%> out for the house <S%H1004><s%> to repair <S%H2393><s%> it.

However, there were not made <S%H6213><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bowls <S%H5592><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> snuffers, <S%H4212><s%> basins, <S%H4219><s%> trumpets, <S%H2689><s%> any vessels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> or vessels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> of the money <S%H3701><s%> that was brought <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>
But they gave <S%H5414><s%> that to the workmen, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H4399><s%> and repaired <S%H2388><s%> therewith the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Moreover they reckoned <S%H2803><s%> not with the men, <S%H582><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> they delivered <S%H5414><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> to be bestowed <S%H5414><s%> on workmen: <S%H6213><s%> <S%H4399><s%> for they dealt <S%H6213><s%> faithfully. <S%H530><s%>
The trespass <S%H817><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> and sin money <S%H3701><s%> was not brought <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it was the priests'. <S%H3548><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Hazael <S%H2371><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Gath, <S%H1661><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it: and Hazael <S%H2371><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to go <S%H5927><s%> up to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And Jehoash <S%H3060><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the hallowed <S%H6944><s%> things that Jehoshaphat, <S%H3092><s%> and Jehoram, <S%H3088><s%> and Ahaziah, <S%H274><s%> his fathers, <S%H1><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> had dedicated, <S%H6942><s%> and his own hallowed <S%H6944><s%> things, and all <S%H3605><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> that was found <S%H4672><s%> in the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and in the king's <S%H4428><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> it to Hazael <S%H2371><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria: <S%H758><s%> and he went <S%H5927><s%> away from Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Joash, <S%H3101><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that he did, <S%H6213><s%> are they not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah? <S%H3063><s%>

And his servants <S%H5650><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and made a conspiracy, <S%H7195><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> Joash <S%H3101><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Millo, <S%H4407><s%> which goes <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Silla. <S%H5538><s%>

For Jozachar <S%H3108><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimeath, <S%H8100><s%> and Jehozabad <S%H3075><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shomer, <S%H7763><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and he died; <S%H4191><s%> and they buried <S%H6912><s%> him with his fathers <S%H1><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of David: <S%H1732><s%> and Amaziah <S%H558><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead. <S%H8478><s%>
